data.title: Basic Plan Features
data.content:
The basic plan is offered for free for users

1.Host up to 100 participants
2.Unlimited 1 to 1 meetings
3.40 mins limit on group meetings
4.Unlimited number of meetings
5.Ticket Support
6.HD video
7.HD voice
8.Active speaker view
9.Full screen and gallery view
10.Simultaneous Screen Share
11.Virtual Background
12.Waiting Room
13.Web Conferencing FeaturesWeb Conferencing Features
14.Group Collaboration FeaturesGroup Collaboration Features
15.SecuritySecurity

data.title: Pro Plan Features
data.content:
The pro plan costs $14.99/mo/host

1.All Basic features +
2.Includes 100 participants
3.Need more participants?
4.Meeting duration limit is 24 hrs
5.User management
6.Admin feature controls
7.Reporting
8.Custom Personal Meeting ID
9.Assign scheduler
10.1GB of MP4 or M4A cloud recording
11.Skype for Business (Lync) interoperability
12.Optional Add-on PlansOptional Add-on Plans

data.title: Business Plan Features
data.content:
The Business plan costs $19.99 /mo/host

1.All Pro features +
2.Includes 300 participants
3.Need more participants?
4.Dedicated phone support
5.Admin dashboard
6.Vanity URL
7.Option for on-premise deployment
8.Managed domains
9.Single sign-on
10.Company branding
11.Custom emails
12.LTI integration
13.Cloud Recording Transcripts
14.Optional Add-on PlansOptional Add-on Plans

data.title: Enterprise paln features
data.content:
The Enterprise plan costs $19.99 /mo/host. 

1.All Business features +
2.Enterprise includes 500 participants
3.Enterprise Plus includes 1,000 participants
4.Unlimited Cloud Storage
5.Dedicated Customer Success Manager
6.Executive Business Reviews
7.Bundle discounts on Webinars and Zoom Rooms
